text:
Status as a student shall create a rebuttable presumption that such person is unavailable for, or unable to enter into, a PAES Participant Agreement and a PAES Plan in order to obtain paid employment within the time limits specified in this Article. This presumption may be rebutted by entering into a PAES Participant Agreement and/or a PAES Plan, in which the applicant/participant agrees to a course of study that: (1) will lead to paid employment within the time limits specified in this Article; and (2) does not prevent the applicant/participant from complying with the other components of the PAES Agreement and/or PAES Plan according to the specified time frame(s). 
(Added by Ord. 150-98, App. 5/8/98)
